member.name: T:NuGet.Client.AnyFramework
member.summary: An internal NuGetFramework marker for ManagedCodeConventions. Most conventions disallow the string 'any' as a txm, so to allow it for conventions with no txm in the path we use this special type.

member.name: T:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions
member.summary: Defines all the package conventions used by Managed Code packages

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.AnyTargettedFile
member.summary: Pattern used to locate all files targetted at a specific runtime and/or framework

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.RuntimeAssemblies
member.summary: Pattern used to locate all files designed for loading as managed code assemblies at run-time

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.CompileRefAssemblies
member.summary: Pattern used to locate ref assemblies for compile.

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.CompileLibAssemblies
member.summary: Pattern used to locate lib assemblies for compile.

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.NativeLibraries
member.summary: Pattern used to locate all files designed for loading as native code libraries at run-time

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.ResourceAssemblies
member.summary: Pattern used to locate all files designed for loading as managed code resource assemblies at run-time

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.MSBuildFiles
member.summary: Pattern used to identify MSBuild targets and props files

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.MSBuildMultiTargetingFiles
member.summary: Pattern used to identify MSBuild global targets and props files

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.ContentFiles
member.summary: Pattern used to identify content files

member.name: T:NuGet.ContentModel.ContentPropertyDefinition
member.summary: Defines a property that can be used in Content Model query patterns

member.name: P:NuGet.ContentModel.ContentPropertyDefinition.CompareTest
member.summary: Find the nearest compatible candidate.

member.name: T:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternSet
member.summary: A set of patterns that can be used to query a set of file paths for items matching a provided criteria.

member.name: P:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternSet.GroupPatterns
member.summary: Patterns used to select a group of items that matches the criteria

member.name: P:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternSet.PathPatterns
member.summary: Patterns used to select individual items that match the criteria

member.name: P:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternSet.PropertyDefinitions
member.summary: Property definitions used for matching patterns

member.name: T:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternDefinition
member.summary: A pattern that can be used to match file paths given a provided criteria.
member.remarks: The pattern is defined as a sequence of literal path strings that must match exactly and property references, wrapped in {} characters, which are tested for compatibility with the consumer-provided criteria.

member.name: P:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternDefinition.Table
member.summary: Replacement token table.

member.name: T:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternTable
member.summary: Replacement token table organized by property.

member.name: M:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternTable.TryLookup(System.String,System.String,System.Object@)
member.summary: Lookup a token and get the replacement if it exists.

member.name: P:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternTableEntry.PropertyName
member.summary: PropertyName moniker

member.name: P:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternTableEntry.Name
member.summary: Item name

member.name: P:NuGet.ContentModel.PatternTableEntry.Value
member.summary: Item replacement value

member.name: T:NuGet.Packaging.IAsyncPackageContentReader
member.summary: An asynchronous package content reader.

member.summary: Asynchronously returns all framework references found in the nuspec.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result () returns an .

member.name: M:NuGet.Packaging.IAsyncPackageContentReader.GetBuildItemsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously returns all items under the build folder.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result () returns an .

member.summary: Asynchronously returns all items under the tools folder.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result () returns an .

member.name: M:NuGet.Packaging.IAsyncPackageContentReader.GetContentItemsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously returns all items found in the content folder.
member.remarks: Some legacy behavior has been dropped here due to the mix of content folders and target framework folders here.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result () returns an .

member.name: M:NuGet.Packaging.IAsyncPackageContentReader.GetLibItemsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously returns all lib items without any filtering.
member.remarks: Use GetReferenceItemsAsync(...) for the filtered list.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result () returns an .

member.name: M:NuGet.Packaging.IAsyncPackageContentReader.GetReferenceItemsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously returns lib items + filtering based on the nuspec and other NuGet rules.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result () returns an .

member.name: M:NuGet.Packaging.IAsyncPackageContentReader.GetPackageDependenciesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously returns package dependencies.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result () returns an .

member.name: T:NuGet.Packaging.IPackageDownloader
member.summary: A package downloader.

member.summary: Gets an asynchronous package content reader.
member.exception: Thrown if this object is disposed.

member.name: P:NuGet.Packaging.IPackageDownloader.CoreReader
member.summary: Gets an asynchronous package core reader.
member.exception: Thrown if this object is disposed.

member.name: M:NuGet.Packaging.IPackageDownloader.CopyNupkgFileToAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously copies a .nupkg to a target file path.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result () returns a indicating whether or not the copy was successful.
member.exception: Thrown if this object is disposed.
Thrown if is either null or empty.

member.name: M:NuGet.Packaging.IPackageDownloader.GetPackageHashAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously gets a package hash.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result () returns a representing the package hash.
member.exception: Thrown if this object is disposed.
Thrown if is either null or empty.

member.name: M:NuGet.Packaging.IPackageDownloader.SetExceptionHandler(System.Func{System.Exception,System.Threading.Tasks.Task{System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Sets an exception handler for package downloads.
member.remarks: The exception handler returns a task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result () returns a indicating whether or not the exception was handled. To handle an exception and stop its propagation, the task should return true. Otherwise, the exception will be rethrown.

member.name: M:NuGet.Packaging.IPackageDownloader.SetThrottle(System.Threading.SemaphoreSlim)
member.summary: Sets a throttle for package downloads.

member.summary: Resolve a set of packages

member.returns: A set of packages meeting the package dependency requirements

member.summary: Resolve a set of packages
member.param: All relevant packages. This list must include the target packages and installed packages.

member.summary: Resolve a set of packages

member.summary: Returns the package info along with a path resolver specific to the folder where the package exists.

member.name: T:NuGet.Packaging.EmptyFrameworkFolderFile
member.summary: Represents an empty framework folder in NuGet 2.0+ packages. An empty framework folder is represented by a file named "_._".

member.name: P:NuGet.Packaging.IPackageFile.Path
member.summary: Gets the full path of the file inside the package.

member.name: P:NuGet.Packaging.IPackageFile.EffectivePath
member.summary: Gets the path that excludes the root folder (content/lib/tools) and framework folder (if present).
member.example:
If a package has the Path as 'content\[net40]\scripts\jQuery.js', the EffectivePath will be 'scripts\jQuery.js'.
If it is 'tools\init.ps1', the EffectivePath will be 'init.ps1'.

member.name: T:NuGet.RuntimeModel.IObjectWriter
member.summary: Provides functionality for writing an object graph. The output format is defined by implementors.

member.name: M:NuGet.RuntimeModel.IObjectWriter.WriteObjectStart(System.String)
member.summary:
Writes the start of a nested object.
This new object becomes the scope for all other method calls until either WriteObjectStart is called again to start a new nested object or WriteObjectEnd is called.
Every call to WriteObjectStart must be balanced by a corresponding call to WriteObjectEnd.
member.param: The name of the object. Throws if null.

member.name: M:NuGet.RuntimeModel.IObjectWriter.WriteObjectEnd
member.summary:
Writes the end of a nested object.
The parent object for this object becomes the scope for subsequent method calls. If this object is the root object, no further writing is allowed.
Every call to WriteObjectStart must be balanced by a corresponding call to WriteObjectEnd.

member.name: M:NuGet.RuntimeModel.IObjectWriter.WriteNameValue(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes a name-value pair.
member.param: The name of the datum. Throws if null.

member.name: M:NuGet.RuntimeModel.IObjectWriter.WriteNameValue(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Writes a name-value pair.
member.param: The name of the datum. Throws if null.

member.name: M:NuGet.RuntimeModel.IObjectWriter.WriteNameValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes a name-value pair.
member.param: The name of the datum. Throws if null.

member.name: M:NuGet.RuntimeModel.IObjectWriter.WriteNameArray(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Writes a name-collection pair.
member.param: The name of the data. Throws if null.

member.name: T:NuGet.RuntimeModel.JsonObjectWriter
member.summary:
Generates JSON from an object graph.
This is non-private only to facilitate unit testing.

member.name: M:NuGet.RuntimeModel.JsonObjectWriter.GetJson
member.summary:
Gets the JSON for the object.
Once is called, no further writing is allowed.

member.name: M:NuGet.RuntimeModel.JsonObjectWriter.GetJObject
member.summary:
Gets the JObject (in-memory JSON model) for the object.
Once is called, no further writing is allowed.

member.name: M:NuGet.RuntimeModel.JsonObjectWriter.WriteTo(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonTextWriter)
member.summary:
Writes the result to a JsonTextWriter.
Once WriteTo is called, no further writing is allowed.
